name: part_001
file: tmp_【 3D LIVE 】Lapis Lazuli ⧸ 重大告知アリ！【 #鷹嶺ルイ重大告知LIVE 】 [PHrZ_dRSy_4]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Takane Lui and Hakos Baelz performing 'INTERNET YAMERO'.
Short MC section where Lui and Baelz thank the audience.
Transition and intro to the next song.

subtitles.original: 四六時中 界隈の徘徊で
subtitles.english: Wandering the neighborhood around the clock,

subtitles.original: 面倒臭さを押し付けられてる
subtitles.english: Having all the hassle forced onto me,

subtitles.original: 何から何まで
subtitles.english: From this to that, everything.

subtitles.original: 思考を止めて また都合良くなる
subtitles.english: Stop thinking and it becomes convenient again,

subtitles.original: 聞くを上手に頷き合ってる
subtitles.english: Skillfully listening and nodding along,

subtitles.original: 仲良しこよしで
subtitles.english: Pretending to be good friends.

subtitles.original: さあ ダダダダ 黙れ黙りたまえよ
subtitles.english: Now, shut up, shut up, just shut your mouth!

subtitles.original: 言えないない そんな強い言葉は
subtitles.english: I can't, I can't say such strong words,

subtitles.original: 少しだけ静かにしてほしいね
subtitles.english: I just want you to be a little quiet.

subtitles.original: あー 私たち 逮捕へ
subtitles.english: Ah, we are heading for arrest!

subtitles.original: 社会 敵・敵・敵 プクヤヤヤ
subtitles.english: Society is full of enemies, enemies, enemies, Puku-yayaya!

subtitles.original: 果たすその日まで
subtitles.english: Until the day we fulfill it.

subtitles.original: ララララ 獄 ヤヤヤ
subtitles.english: La-la-la-la, prison, yayaya!

subtitles.original: あの世の棒にも ヤヤヤ
subtitles.english: Even a stick in the afterlife, yayaya!

subtitles.original: 社会 敵・敵・敵 好かれ合い愛
subtitles.english: Society is enemies, enemies, enemies, loving each other,

subtitles.original: 約束の地まで
subtitles.english: Until we reach the promised land.

subtitles.original: さあ カキクケコ 待ってん待ってん
subtitles.english: Now, Ka-Ki-Ku-Ke-Ko, waiting, waiting,

subtitles.original: てててて 毒 ヤヤヤ
subtitles.english: Te-te-te-te, poison, yayaya!

subtitles.original: 今日も来ない
subtitles.english: You're not coming today either,

subtitles.original: そっちの気だね
subtitles.english: I guess that's how you feel.

subtitles.original: いいえ 寝るから
subtitles.english: No, I'm going to sleep,

subtitles.original: 私一人でもやっておきますね
subtitles.english: So I'll just do it by myself.

subtitles.original: 全て 全て
subtitles.english: Everything, everything,

subtitles.original: 全て任せて
subtitles.english: Leave everything to me,

subtitles.original: それをさせてよ
subtitles.english: Let me do that.

subtitles.original: あたしのことなの
subtitles.english: It's about me,

subtitles.original: 分かっているでしょ
subtitles.english: You understand, right?

subtitles.original: 四六時中 界隈の徘徊で
subtitles.english: Wandering the neighborhood around the clock,

subtitles.original: 面倒臭い まま
subtitles.english: Remaining troublesome,

subtitles.original: 今日も明日も過ぎて行くのでしょう
subtitles.english: Today and tomorrow will probably just pass by.

subtitles.original: みんなー！今日は来てくれてありがとう！
subtitles.english: Everyone! Thanks for coming today!

subtitles.original: やったー！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: 一緒に歌ってたよ！
subtitles.english: We sang together!

subtitles.original: 楽しい！
subtitles.english: So fun!

subtitles.original: いぇーい！
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: 花瓶に水をあげましょう
subtitles.english: Let's water the vase.

subtitles.original: 時の中 萎れたこと
subtitles.english: I forgot that it had withered

subtitles.original: 忘れてた
subtitles.english: within the passage of time.

subtitles.original: さあ ダダダダ 黙れ黙りたまえよ
subtitles.english: Now, shut up, shut up, just shut your mouth!

subtitles.original: 言えないない そんな強い言葉は
subtitles.english: I can't, I can't say such strong words,

subtitles.original: 少しだけ静かにしてほしいね
subtitles.english: I just want you to be a little quiet.

subtitles.original: あー 私たち 逮捕へ
subtitles.english: Ah, we are heading for arrest!

subtitles.original: 今と未来
subtitles.english: The present and the future...

subtitles.original: 見たかったはずなのに
subtitles.english: I was supposed to want to see them.

subtitles.original: 社会 敵・敵・敵 プクヤヤヤ
subtitles.english: Society is full of enemies, enemies, enemies, Puku-yayaya!

subtitles.original: 見えぬその日まで
subtitles.english: Until that unseen day.

subtitles.original: ドドドド 毒 ヤヤヤ
subtitles.english: Do-do-do-do, poison, yayaya!

subtitles.original: この世の理 ヤヤヤ
subtitles.english: The logic of this world, yayaya!

subtitles.original: 今は セセセセ プク サササ
subtitles.english: Now, se-se-se-se, puku-sasasa!

subtitles.original: あなたの間違い
subtitles.english: Your mistake.

subtitles.original: 片付くのはバッテンさ
subtitles.english: Getting it tidied up is an X (fail).

subtitles.original: 社会 敵・敵・敵 プクヤヤヤ
subtitles.english: Society is full of enemies, enemies, enemies, Puku-yayaya!

subtitles.original: 果たすその日まで
subtitles.english: Until the day we fulfill it.

subtitles.original: レレレレ 獄 ヤヤヤ
subtitles.english: Le-le-le-le, prison, yayaya!

subtitles.original: あの世の棒にも ヤヤヤ
subtitles.english: Even a stick in the afterlife, yayaya!

subtitles.original: 社会 敵・敵・敵 好かれ合い愛
subtitles.english: Society is enemies, enemies, enemies, loving each other,

subtitles.original: 約束の地まで
subtitles.english: Until we reach the promised land.

subtitles.original: さあ カキクケコ 待ってん待ってん
subtitles.english: Now, Ka-Ki-Ku-Ke-Ko, waiting, waiting,

subtitles.original: てててて 尽くし並び
subtitles.english: Te-te-te-te, lined up with devotion,

subtitles.original: 天 地 ノ ワ イ を開けましょう
subtitles.english: Let's open the Heaven, Earth, and No-Why!

subtitles.original: もういいじゃん 向きになっちゃって
subtitles.english: Enough already, getting all serious.

subtitles.original: カッコつけて カッコよくない
subtitles.english: Acting cool but it's not cool at all.

subtitles.original: そういうの嫌になってんだ
subtitles.english: I'm getting sick of that kind of stuff.

subtitles.original: 放っといてよ 死にたくない
subtitles.english: Leave me alone, I don't want to die.

subtitles.original: もういいじゃん ヤケになってんの
subtitles.english: Enough already, are you getting desperate?

subtitles.original: 嫉妬したり じっとできない
subtitles.english: Getting jealous, can't sit still.

subtitles.original: 聞こえないよう 耳塞いだって
subtitles.english: Even if I cover my ears so I can't hear,

subtitles.original: 入ってくるじゃん しんどいな
subtitles.english: It still gets in, it's so exhausting.

subtitles.original: 僕は誰も望まないよ
subtitles.english: I don't wish for anyone.

subtitles.original: だから僕のこと そっとしておいて
subtitles.english: So please, just leave me alone.

subtitles.original: ウザい だけの馬鹿に はいはいはい
subtitles.english: To the annoying idiots, yeah, yeah, yeah.

subtitles.original: 受ける またのぼせ待ってるね
subtitles.english: Hilarious, you're getting carried away again.

subtitles.original: だとか 本当は怯えてる
subtitles.english: Saying that, but really I'm scared.

subtitles.original: 吠えるだけの弱虫だった
subtitles.english: I was just a coward who could only bark.

subtitles.original: 痛い癖に耐えて はいはいはい
subtitles.english: Enduring the pain, yeah, yeah, yeah.

subtitles.original: いつも平気なふりばっかなの
subtitles.english: Always just pretending to be fine.

subtitles.original: 僕は壁を張ったまま笑う
subtitles.english: I laugh while keeping my walls up.

subtitles.original: それ以上 近づかないでって
subtitles.english: "Don't come any closer."

subtitles.original: すごいじゃん
subtitles.english: Amazing, huh?

subtitles.original: ばかばっか
subtitles.english: Just idiots.

subtitles.original: ばかばっか
subtitles.english: Just idiots.

subtitles.original: ばかばっか
subtitles.english: Just idiots.

subtitles.original: やだ ばかばっか
subtitles.english: No way, just idiots.

subtitles.original: もういいじゃん まだ怒ってんの
subtitles.english: Enough already, are you still angry?

subtitles.original: 放っといてよ 放っとできない
subtitles.english: Leave me alone... I can't leave you alone.

subtitles.original: 見ないように目を逸らしたって
subtitles.english: Even if I look away to avoid seeing,

subtitles.original: ついてくるじゃん やっぱり
subtitles.english: It follows me, after all.

subtitles.original: 転がったら起きればいいじゃん
subtitles.english: If you fall, just get up.

subtitles.original: 失くしたなら探せばいいじゃん
subtitles.english: If you lost it, just search for it.

subtitles.original: いやいやいやいや
subtitles.english: No, no, no, no.

subtitles.original: それって良くない
subtitles.english: That's not good.

subtitles.original: 間違ってたら直せばいいじゃん
subtitles.english: If it's wrong, just fix it.

subtitles.original: 嫌だったら辞めればいいじゃん
subtitles.english: If you hate it, just quit.
